creator: adrian.bala@gmail.com
text:
Development of entire tree or sub-tree by short-cut similar to its equivalent of collapse with Ctr ^ -

Would be useful to be able take an opposite action to collapse with similar short-cut, let's say Ctr^+

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
There are already keystrokes for expand and collapse.

Tree collapse = Control + Minus
Tree expand = Control + Shift + Minus
